item.title: Read Replicas with VFS
item.description: The Litestream VFS serves SQLite reads directly from replica storage instead of restoring a full database file. It builds an index from LTX files, fetches pages on-demand, and keeps a cached view in sync by polling for new frames. Replica layout & restore plan Replicas store snapshots plus incremental LTX files on two levels: L0: raw transactional files generated during replication. L1+: compacted LTX files that merge older L0 segments. The VFS computes a restore plan before opening a connection.
